>>> import pisgmRSA
>>> x = pisgmRSA.keyObj()
>>> fou = open("pub.pem", "rb")
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'pub.pem'
>>> fou = open("pub.pem", "wb")
>>> fou.write(x.key
x.keyR  x.keyU  
>>> fou.write(x.keyU.export_key())
450
>>> fou.close
<built-in method close of _io.BufferedWriter object at 0x7f620b36cb40>
>>> fou.close()
>>> fov = open("priv.pem", "wb")
>>> fov.write(x.key
x.keyR  x.keyU  
>>> fov.write(x.keyR.export_key())
1674
>>> fov.close()
>>> y = pisgmRSA.keyObj(0, {"private": "priv.pem", "public": "pub.pem"})
>>> x
<pisgmRSA.keyObj object at 0x7f620ba95c10>
>>> y
